title: Almost Got Scammed - V.P.P order for 2340 Rs
selftext:
Today we got a VPP registered post from india post for an amount of 2340Rs.

Since i was little busy , i told my staff to get it , since i was expecting other couriers and other CODs today.

Luckily i saw the courier and it was addressed to our office and upon further examining , it was about three books related to employee.

Courier PIC : https://i.imgur.com/8kUwdop.jpg

Upon searching , we found further such incidents with the same book shop in delhi

https://www.consumercomplaints.in/bycompany/mega-book-co-delhi-a195500.html

http://ccrc.in/complaint_detail.php?cid=52018&page=347&cn=&kw=&cc=&c=&s=&sdate=&edate=

I just want to warn fellow redditors that these are either new or been used for years. Either way educating ourselves , and also particularly family members who might pay and get these.
comments: it means site where you ordered actual goods sold your data to scammer who sent fake package to you on same date
no , this is our recent registration of our business with central govt, which puts info on public, since the day of registration ,we have been bombarded with emails and whatnot.
